results.title: 4 Engraved Large US Navy Whiskey Rocks / Stones & Muslin Bag, Perfect Stocking Stuffer, Great US Military Christmas Gift, Made in the USA
results.description:
Whiskey Stones are a Unique and Popular gift on their own, but when they are personalized they become extra special.

This listing is for a set of 4 Large Engraved Whiskey Stones.  They make a great gift for a current or veteran Military hero!  

Christmas, Birthdays, Anniversaries, Military Weddings, Whiskey Stones are always a well received gift.

Each Whiskey Stone measures 1.15" x 1" and is made of 100% Soapstone right here in the USA. Only 1 or 2  are needed per drink.  Each set comes in it's own Muslin Storage bag with an instructions for use card.

The pictured stones are currently engraved with the US Navy Emblem, USN and the recipients Initials however each order can be customized and I can engrave anything on the Stones, just send me your engraving instructions in the "Notes to Seller" section at check out or send me an Etsy Convo.  If you would like to use a different Military Logo please let me know.

**Please note the listing is for only ONE SIDE of each stone engraved, they can be the same as the main picture or please feel free to switch out any of the images or words and replace them with initials or names etc... Please specify any changes in the Notes to Seller at checkout**

**What are Whiskey Stones?**

Whiskey Stones, are a new way to chill your whiskey or wine without diluting your drink. Ice cubes water down your whiskey and leave a moist layer of condensation on your glass, whiskey stones have all the benefits of ice without the hassles.

Whiskey Stones are made out of cubes of solid soapstone which is softer than granite and won’t scratch your glass. Soapstone retains its temperature much longer than ice, so it will cool your whiskey or liquor of your choice and provide a more sustained chill. Whiskey Stones are also non-porous, odorless and tasteless so they won’t alter your favorite drinks. Whiskey Stones can also be used to warm your drinks and work well with non-alcoholic beverages too.  Whiskey stones are Dishwasher Safe.

**I'M ALL ABOUT CUSTOM ORDERS SO IF YOU NEED MULTIPLES PLEASE CONTACT ME FOR A DISCOUNT PRICE, I WILL DO MY BEST TO WORK WITHIN YOUR BUDGET**

Still thinking and in need of more ideas?  Check out my shop via the link below for more great gifts for Men.  I add new items weekly so please Favorite my shop so you are the first to see the new arrivals.
https://www.etsy.com/shop/TheUltimateManShop

**Sometimes it is difficult to estimate the shipping cost for every location, and therefore if the shipping costs less than you paid we will refund the difference.  We go through each week to see where, if any, shipping has been less and then we issue a shipping refund for the difference.  On the other hand if the shipping actually cost more than you paid, well that's our problem as we set the prices so we will take the hit.**

**Shipping within the US**  We know you would like to receive your order as soon as possible, and therefore use Priority Mail for the vast majority of what we ship.  We may use First Class post for small, lighter items to make sure the postage cost is as low as possible for you.  We make no money on shipping and always try to price our shipping at the most economical and quickest route for customers.

**Shipping to Canada**  To ship to Canada we use Priority Mail and First Class international mail.  Again, we price our shipping costs at the most economical we can after taking into account the shipping and packaging price.  

**For Shipping everywhere else**  We welcome international orders, and ship First Class International.  We did our best to weigh items and price them for international shipping, which we know can be expensive.  However please note that none of our prices include any possible custom charges in your country of residence.  We hope you understand that though it is rare, any additional charges from your country of residence are the responsibility of the customer.

Shop.policy_shipping:
GENERAL INFORMATION 

All items will ship within 2-3 business days of the order being placed. We ship from Santa Rosa, California. Incomplete or incorrectly placed orders may result in a processing delay. 

Shipping costs vary depending on item. Each listing will have shipping method and costs under the item description.

Multiple item orders will always receive discounted shipping rates if they are purchased at the same time. It will automatically be calculated and discounted at checkout.

...............................................................................
...............................................................................

US ORDERS:

Most items that are shipped within the United States will be shipped via the United States Postal Service. All shipments include a tracking number that will automatically be sent to the email linked to your Etsy account, when the shipping label is created.

          -FIRST CLASS MAIL - Average transit time is 5-7 business days, but may take longer during holiday seasons.

          -PRIORITY MAIL -Average transit time is 2-3 business days, but may take longer during holiday seasons.

          -EXPRESS MAIL - Available as an upgrade by request. Delivery is guaranteed within 2 business days of being shipped.

          -GLASSWARE/ OVERSIZED ORDERS - Are mainly shipped through Fed Ex Ground. Average transit time is 3-7 business days, but may take longer during holiday seasons. 

***Please note that Fed Ex cannot ship to PO Boxes***

...............................................................................
...............................................................................

INTERNATIONAL ORDERS:

International orders are also shipped within 2-3 business days via United States Postal Service. All shipments include a tracking number that will automatically be sent to the email linked to your Etsy account, when the shipping label is created. Insurance is not included. If you would like to purchase it, please let me know before checkout and I will adjust your invoice accordingly.

          -FIRST CLASS MAIL - Average transit time is 10-28 business days, but may take longer during holiday seasons or depending on a countries individual customs inspection timeline.

          -PRIORITY MAIL - Our standard shipping method for most items. Average transit time is 6-10 business days, but may take longer during holiday seasons or depending on a countries individual customs inspection timeline.

          -EXPRESS MAIL - Available as an upgrade by request. Average transit time is 3-5 business days, but may take longer during holiday seasons or depending on a countries individual customs inspection timeline.

          -GLASSWARE - Is Shipped via USPS Priority Mail. We know the prices are steep for shipping, but glasses are heavy and you are far away! We package all of our glasses securely in tissue paper, bubble wrap and packing peanuts inside a small box and put them inside larger boxes also filled with bubble wrap. In the thousands of glasses we have shipped, only one has ever broken....something we take great pride in. 

In the rare event a glass is broken in transit, we unfortunately cannot accept responsibility. You will need to contact USPS directly to file a damaged claim with them, as this is most assuredly due to rough handling in transit, not a packaging issue on our end. They will probably require photos of the damaged item in the packaging, so make sure to save it!

CUSTOM AND DUTY FEES:
          - These will be the responsibility of the buyer. By purchasing an item from our shop, you are agreeing to pay the associated custom's import duties/fees. 
          
          - To calculate fee estimates, we recommend using: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculation/

CONFISCATED INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS: 
          - While we know many countries import laws, that we ship to regularly, our knowledge is not exhaustive. By purchasing an item in our shop, you are acknowledging that it can be legally imported into your country. We will declare proper item value and descriptions when shipping, but are not responsible for items confiscated by customs officials due to import violations. 
          
          - If you are uncertain of your country's import restrictions, please use this link: http://pe.usps.com/text/imm/ab_toc.htm

...............................................................................
...............................................................................


UNCOMMON BUT NOT UNHEARD OF PROBLEMS WITH MAIL DELIVERY:

          - UNABLE TO DELIVER - If a package is returned to us after unsuccessful delivery attempt by USPS due to an incorrect or incomplete address provided on the Etsy account/order, the customer will be responsible for the cost of reshipping. Contact us to make a payment and we will resend the package.

          - LOST PACKAGE - We will replace and reship your order at our expense if the tracking number does not show as "delivered"  and there is no activity on a tracking number:
         
          ~ Within two weeks of the ship date for domestic packages 
          ~Within four weeks for Canada*
          ~Within six weeks for other international packages*
          
          *To account for potential customs delayes

          - ADDITIONALLY - Please note that we understandably cannot be responsible if the item has been marked as delivered through the tracking number, and you have not received it. This is a USPS or Fed Ex issue, and you will need to contact them directly.

          - CONFISCATED INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS - By purchasing an item in our shop, you are acknowledging that it can be legally imported into your country. We will declare proper item value and descriptions when shipping, but are not responsible for items confiscated by customs officials due to import violations. 
          
- If you are uncertain of your country's import restrictions, please use this link: http://pe.usps.com/text/imm/ab_toc.htm
Shop.policy_refunds:
REFUNDS

          ~All of our custom pieces are made especially for you. Unfortunately we are not able to accept returns due to the custom nature of these products. Please read the item description and instructions carefully and ask any questions before ordering.

          ~Non-custom (pre-made) items can be returned 7 days from the delivery date only, in original packaging, and in brand new condition. The cost of the item will be refunded, however the shipping is the responsibility of the buyer.

...............................................................................
...............................................................................

CANCELLATIONS

          ~If you would like to cancel an order, please contact us immediately. Please don't assume that sending a cancellation request insures that your order will be cancelled.  
          Due to our fast turnaround time, items are usually engraved the morning after the order is placed. If your order has been engraved, it will be shipped and ineligible for a cancellation or a refund. We will confirm if the order has been cancelled or not via convo.

...............................................................................
...............................................................................

MISTAKES

While it is very very rare that we make mistakes on an order, we are only human. If we do  make a mistake on your order, we will always give you two options:

~ We can send a replacement out to fix our error and you can keep the first item as well, or

 ~ You can return the incorrect item for a full refund including the cost of the original shipping.**

~ Understandably we may require a photo of the error for our records. 

**Return shipping costs are final and are never refundable.
Shop.policy_additional:
SALES TAX ~ We are required to charge sales tax for all transactions from customers located in California. 

WOOD AND LEATHER PRODUCTS ~ All our natural wood and leather products contain a completely unique grain and hue. It is part of the appeal of a natural item. For this reason, please allow variation in engraving color and depth of these products.

GLASSWARE ~ While we have many skills, making glassware is not one of them. We order our glasses through American manufacturers and hand engrave each one to order. We check each glass prior to engraving for any noticeable flaws. As each piece of glass is completely unique, please allow for small imperfections on the surface of the glass. We like to think it adds character!

ENGRAVING SPECS ~ We will attempt to honor all custom engraving requests, however there are some instances where a layout may not work as requested. We retain the right to use our experienced discretion to make slight changes if we feel necessary. If any large changes must be made, we will contact you first.

PURCHASING OF KNIVES ~  By purchasing a knife from FrederickEngraving, you are agreeing you are at least 18 years of age. 

RELEASE OF LIABILITY ~ Other products that we offer may also be sharp. By purchasing from FrederickEngraving, you are agreeing to use all products in a safe and legal manner and keep away from minors or irresponsible individuals.

CHILDREN'S JEWELRY ~ As with any jewelry, chains and pendants may pose as a strangulation or choking hazard to children. Do not leave children unattended while wearing these products. By purchasing a Frederick Engraving item for a child, you are agreeing to use it in a safe and legal manner, and keep it out of the hands of irresponsible or immature individuals.

...............................................................................
...............................................................................

COMMUNICATIONS

          ~We only respond to communication via Etsy convo, per Etsy recommendations. This creates a permanent record of communication and protects both the buyer and seller. Outside emails, telephone calls or other communications will not be replied to or acknowledged.

...............................................................................
...............................................................................

COPYRIGHTS AND INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

          ~ We retain full copyright of our photos, designs, layouts and intellectual property. 

         ~ Using our photos, designs, layouts, or plagiarizing our listings is an infringement on these copyrights and will not be permitted.

...............................................................................
...............................................................................

WHOLESALE OPPORTUNITIES

          ~ Purchasing and reselling our items are not allowed. 

          ~ We work with many boutiques across the country, who carry our Frederick Engraving branded items. 

          ~ We offer wholesaling partnerships to select boutiques who we think would be a good fit for our brand. Convo me if you would like to fill out an application to resell our Frederick Engraving products.

Shipping to residential and to Hawaii are often extra. If the actual shipping price is more than 10% of what was quoted automatically in your order then we will need to collect the balance prior to shipping or making the custom order request.
Shop.policy_welcome:
The Vintage Wood Floor Company prides itself on preserving the authentic heritage of old structures by giving them new life. The original siding, flooring, beams, and other timber we recover are carefully collected and re-purposed within an eco-friendly framework that preserves the past while respecting the environment.

Here's where we sell some odds and ends, curious finds, and non-custom items.
Shop.policy_payment: All orders are to be prepaid prior to work commencing.
Shop.policy_shipping:
When requesting a quote for shipping please make sure to provide all of the following: (1) Address and indication of whether it is a Residential or Commercial location, (2) Is liftgate-equipped delivery required (choose this if you do not have a dock or forklift at the delivery location).

Shipping quotes are estimates only. Should Etsy quote a shipping rate that is more than 15% lower than actual shipping costs we may ask you to pay the difference. We do not mark up our shipping costs. All shipping prices quoted with an item are general estimates and are not a guarantee of final shipping costs. Any items whose shipping cost ends up being more than 15% of the estimate will require payment of the balance prior to commencement of work.
Shop.policy_refunds:
We'll gladly refund your purchase price, less shipping if you are not completely happy with what you ordered if there is something wrong with the order. "Quality" should not be confused with natural imperfections as these are the desirable points of uniqueness in reclaimed products. We will strive to replace or refund your investment at our discretion. Please contact us to make arrangements. You'll need to pay for return shipping of course.

No products may be returned if the product has been installed, cut or altered in any way. All defective product(s) must be returned freight prepaid within thirty (30) days of material delivery. Any product found to be a manufacturing defect will be replaced. The Vintage Wood Floor Company, Inc. will not be liable for any labor or expense due to removal or replacement of flooring, beams or other products.

2. All products are manufactured from reclaimed/recovered wood, as such product sold with existing paint or stain may have lead-based hazards.

3. Wood is a natural product and will have color variations from board to board, as well as, imperfections including, but not limited to, cracks, knots, wormholes, nail holes, chips, splinters, color variation and mineral deposit streaks. Each plank of wood sands differently and can exhibit significant differences in color and grain pattern. The samples shown are meant to be consistent to the species and specific grade of wood purchased; actual color may vary.

4. Purchaser is aware that The Vintage Wood Floor Company, Inc. suggests a 15% - 20% waste factor on all barn siding and dimensional lumber. In the event that the ordered quantity is not sufficient and additional lumber becomes necessary to complete a job, a $ 350.00 minimum and (1) – (2) weeks lead time will be enforced. results.title: Flat Braid Kangaroo Leather Bracelet in Whiskey
results.description:
This is a flat braid bracelet in kangaroo leather. The 4-string braid of the enclosure brings both sides together to continue in an 8-string braid down the rest of the bracelet and is then rolled flat. 

This can also be worn as an ankle bracelet. 

Available in listed colors. 

Unless otherwise specified, all bracelets are custom braided. Please leave your exact wrist measurement in the comment section of your order. Measure your wrist just behind the protruding wrist bone. Measure in either inches or centimeters. 

All orders come with one name hand calligraphed. I use a pointed pen nib in an oblique holder with ink made by myself.

Shop.title: artworks4us
Shop.announcement:
Welcome to artworks4us! My goal is to provide artwork which integrates seamlessly into your lifestyle. Whether it is by my 10+ years experience in leather braiding, rope, or my pieces in pen or pencil, I hope you find something to suit your tastes. Enjoy browsing my pieces!

When you make a purchase, I will donate 20% of the sale price to Educational Outcomes. This 401c charity assists needy  children to receive the education they deserve. There are no service fees, salaries or incentives paid to anyone. All monies donated go towards educatonal materials and the shipping to get it to the children. Their work helps children here at home and abroad. If you are gifting one of my pieces, your gift is twofold by helping build education in communities. A thank you card will be enclosed with each purchase, which can be passed on to your recipient. Thank you so much!
www.educationaloutcomes.org
